item.title: Electronic Signature Services
item.description: This building block provides a qualified electronic signature service of PDF files with the following characteristics:<!-- raw HTML omitted --> <!-- raw HTML omitted --> <!-- raw HTML omitted -->eIDAS-compliant using the <!-- raw HTML omitted -->PAdES<!-- raw HTML omitted --> standard.<!-- raw HTML omitted --> <!-- raw HTML omitted -->Invisible signatures (can be consulted in PDF metadata)<!-- raw HTML omitted --> <!-- raw HTML omitted -->Suitable for long-term archival including a trusted timestamp (via the LTA profile)<!-- raw HTML omitted --> <!-- raw HTML omitted -->
